originalPrompt:
Create an incredible visualization of AI assembly lines manufacturing digital platforms!

Show vast, high-tech factory floors with:
- Massive AML (Actionable Machine Learning) engines as the centerpiece
- Conveyor belts made of flowing data streams and light
- Raw data entering as swirling, chaotic information clouds
- AML engines transforming data into structured, glowing platform components
- Finished digital platforms emerging as crystalline, complete structures
- AI robotic arms assembling business logic and user interfaces

The transformation process should show:
- Raw data (chaotic, unstructured) flowing into the engines
- AML processes as brilliant energy transformation chambers
- Platform components being assembled with precision
- Finished platforms emerging as beautiful, functional digital entities
- Continuous production at revolutionary speed

Visual environment:
- Sleek, ultra-modern factory setting
- Bright cyan and blue energy throughout
- Holographic quality controls and monitoring systems
- Sense of precision, efficiency, and revolutionary speed
- Scale that shows industrial-level platform production

No text - pure visual demonstration of digital platform manufacturing!
revisedPrompt: Close your eyes and visualize a grand, futuristic assembly line. Imagine a vast, high-tech factory floor with immense actionable machine learning engines as the central element. Picture conveyor belts constructed of glowing data streams and light. Raw data enters this extraordinary scene as swirling, chaotic clouds of information. The machine learning engines process this data, transforming it into structured, glowing, platform components. When the components emerge, they form final, crystalline structures that are complete digital platforms. AI robotic arms contribute to the workflow, assembling business logic and user interfaces with micro-accuracy. Throughout the process, raw, chaotic data flows into the engines, gets transformed in brilliant energy chambers signifying the machine learning processes taking place, and ultimately forms assembled digital platforms. These platforms glow with energy, reflecting the beauty of their functionality and the precision of their assembly. The whole environment is situated in a sleek, ultra-modern factory setting, featuring bright cyan and blue energies casting a radiant glow throughout. Holographic systems control and monitor the quality assurance processes, demonstrating a feeling of futuristic splendor. This is not just a factory, it is a symbol of an industrial revolution where digital platforms are manufactured with remarkable speed and efficiency.
